item.title: De Palma Deep Dive
item.description:
I'm (re)watching a bunch of Brian De Palma films. Not a ranking, just keeping track of the watch order. I'm watching other stuff too, so this will take a while.

  • Body Double
  • Blow Out
  • Carrie
  • Snake Eyes
  • Raising Cain
  • Wise Guys
item.dc:creator: Dave Samojlenko

item.dc:creator: Dave Samojlenko

item.title: Tarantino Rewatched
item.description:
This is a list of my most rewatched Tarantino films.

I only recently started using Letterboxd, so not going by stats. Just have to go by my gut/memory.

Will be interesting to watch this list over time and compare against diary rewatches.

  1. Pulp Fiction

    This movie hit at exactly the right time for me- I was in college studying theatre and a film nut, and it was probably one of my earliest DVD purchases. This was on a lot.

  2. Jackie Brown

    This is a very close second, and could even be #1. I love putting this movie on and just being in the room with it.

  3. Reservoir Dogs
  4. Kill Bill: Vol. 1
  5. Kill Bill: Vol. 2
  6. The Hateful Eight
  7. Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood

    This is where recency hurts in this list. This one could climb some spots in the long tail of the films on this list.

  8. Inglourious Basterds
  9. Django Unchained
  10. Death Proof
item.dc:creator: Dave Samojlenko

...plus 90 more. View the full list on Letterboxd.
